long_description: The smooth and sophisticated leather Merrell Sector Pike shoes are made to respond to your every action during a day at work or a casual outing across town. Full-grain leather and cow suede uppers have breathable mesh linings to keep your feet cool and dry. Natural enzymes prevent odors from developing before they start for fresh smelling feet. Shoes are constructed with a combination of natural flex, contoured support and performance cushioning for all-day comfort. Air cushions in the heels absorb shock. Merrell Sector Pike shoes have durable traction with 3.5mm-deep lugs that grip when and where you need it.
short_description: The smooth and sophisticated leather Merrell Sector Pike shoes are made to respond to your every action during a day at work or a casual outing across town.
